tags.name: if-diff-then-stiff
tags.description:
Alternative to Polymer's dom-if element that allows comparison between two operands, as well as progressive enhancement.
DOM deletion takes place on non matching elements.

attributes.name: if
attributes.description: Boolean property / attribute -- must be true to pass test(s)

attributes.name: equals
attributes.description: lhs must equal rhs to pass tests.

attributes.name: not-equals
attributes.description: lhs must not equal rhs to pass tests.

attributes.name: includes
attributes.description:
For strings, this means lhs.indexOf(rhs) > -1
For arrays, this means lhs intersect rhs = rhs
For numbers, this means lhs >= rhs
For objects, this means all the properties of rhs match the same properties of lhs

attributes.name: data-key-name
attributes.description: Name of dataset key to set to 1 if true and -1 if false, if dataset key is present

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: byos
properties.description: Bring your own style.  If false (default), the if-diff adds a style to set target element's display to none when test fails.

properties.name: if
properties.description: Boolean property / attribute -- must be true to pass test(s)

properties.name: equals
properties.description: lhs must equal rhs to pass tests.

properties.name: not_equals
properties.description: lhs must not equal rhs to pass tests.

properties.name: includes
properties.description:
For strings, this means lhs.indexOf(rhs) > -1
For arrays, this means lhs intersect rhs = rhs
For numbers, this means lhs >= rhs
For objects, this means all the properties of rhs match the same properties of lhs

properties.name: enable
properties.description: css selector of children of matching element  to remove disabled attribute

properties.name: dataKeyName
properties.description: Name of dataset key to set to 1 if true and -1 if false, if dataset key is present

properties.name: m
properties.description: Maximum number of elements that are effected by condition.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Computed based on values of  if / equals / not_equals / includes

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

tags.name: if-diff
tags.description:
Alternative to Polymer's dom-if element that allows comparison between two operands, as well as progressive enhancement.
No DOM deletion takes place on non matching elements.
[More Info](https://github.com/bahrus/if-diff)

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description:
Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.

properties.name: evCount
properties.description: Tracks how many times each event type was called.

Any component that emits events should not do so if it is disabled.
Note that this is not enforced, but the disabled property is made available.
Users of this mix-in should ensure not to call "de" if this property is set to true.
